name: Musharna
author: MAHOU
flavor_text: It drowses and dreams all the time. It’s best to leave it be if it’s just woken up, as it’s a terrible grump when freshly roused from sleep.

attacks.name: Sleepy Pulse
attacks.effect: Your opponent’s Active Pokémon is now Asleep. During Pokémon Checkup, your opponent flips 2 coins instead of 1. If either of them is tails, that Pokémon is still Asleep.

attacks.name: Super Hypnoblast
attacks.effect: If your opponent’s Active Pokémon is Asleep, this attack does 120 more damage.
